english.segment1: (Deitrick). Father we are all here to worship., and praise you (yeah, yeah). and Father we are so sincere to show you., how much we love you (yeah yeah)
english.segment3: What a mighty God we serve. ( what a mighty God we serve). The creator of heaven and earth. (the creator of heaven and earth)
english.segment4: Vamp. There are no words that I can say, to glorify the greatest name. When others are ashamed to say, I will still proclaim you're a mighty God.
english.segment5: you're a mighty God. you're a mighty God. you're a mighty God. you're a mighty God. you're mighty, you're mighty. I will still proclaim you're a mighty God
